attributes.action: Make Pubs, Clubs And Bars Implement Stricter Drink Spiking Prevention Measures
attributes.additional_details: With Lockdown restrictions easing, young people have returned to clubs and bars in huge numbers. Unfortunately, so have those who wish to drug unsuspecting young people in such venues in order to sexually assault them and take advantage of them. There have also been reports of injections being administered to unsuspecting people in packed clubs. With Students returning to university, this issue has gotten worse. Essentially, drink spiking has become the epidemic within the pandemic.
attributes.background: We want the Government to impose explicit duty on clubs, pubs and bars across the country in regards to drink spiking. This duty could include, but is not limited to: Offering drink covers; offering testing strips for the most common types of 'date rape' drugs in drinks and thorough searches.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make it a legal requirement for nightclubs to thoroughly search guests on entry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598986

Fund free drink spiking test kits for all bars: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597143

Require clubs and bars to offer lids with straws for drinks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596308

Require licensed venues to introduce anti-spiking policies, and fund training: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599289
